row.entry: This module allows to enhance the local contrast. It uses CLAHE (Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization).

sect3.title: Usage
sect3.para: Local contrast boost the details of your image without changing the global contrast.

sect4.title: radius
sect4.para: Set the size of the details to preserve.

sect4.title: amount
sect4.para: Set the strength of the effect.
